body.name: Baby Bottle Glass Wide Neck, Closer to Breastfeeding, Slow Flow Nipple, Anti-Colic, 4 Ounce, 2 Count (Blue)

Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 20 hrs 26 mins
features: CAREFULLY DESIGNED: FDBTL Baby Bottle helps all babies suck more comfortably with glass material. To achieve this effect, FDBTL made numerous improvements in the material selection and design, summarizing more than 500 mothers' feedback.
EASY TO USE: This baby bottle is easy to clean, and high temperature resistant, and baby bottles are designed to most closely mimic breastfeeding.

ANTI-COLIC VALVE: Our baby bottles ensure natural milk flow, eliminate bubbles and gas, and prevent spit-up and even colic. Our baby pacifiers are made from natural rubber. Natural soft nipple mimics the feeling of the breast, reduces air intake, and helps prevent colic in babies.
NATURAL GLASS BOTTLE: Our Long-lasting & Reusable Glass Baby Bottles are made of premium quality glass, which is safe for babies with 100% Free of BPA.
IDEAL FOR NEWBORN BOTTLES: Our soft natural rubber nipple and anti-colic dual valve ease the transition from breast milk to bottle, eliminating discomfort for your baby.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love these bottles to feed my infant son. I ordered the first set on prime day since it was a deal and wanted to try. Since then I have ordered three more sets of bottles. The glass is so thin and light, but it’s durable and dishwasher safe. My son drinks his milk from them easily and they are free of plastic. I like these better than the name brand bottles originally ordered off my registry. Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Baby likes it!
reviews.reviewText: Bottles are exactly what I was looking for, comes with 4 nipples & 2 bottles. I was looking for a glass bottle & nipple my EBF baby would accept when I had to go back to work. He latches on this bottle/nipple well & doesn’t have issues switching from bottle back to breast.My only complaint is that they don’t make the bottles in a bigger size for my baby to use later on!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 10, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars great glass bottle
reviews.reviewText: I wanted glass bottles so that I could warm them in hot water I feel like the milk stays warmer longer in the glass bottles. The bottle gets real hot so I use a burp cloth to take it out of the water. These bottles are strong and the nipples are great for my newborn. I am mostly breastfeeding and we have not had any troubles with nipple confusion.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 12, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Favorite Baby Bottle
reviews.reviewText: Tried many different baby bottles and finally found this one. Light, easy to clean and doesn’t leak. My favorite part is the soft nipple. My baby wouldn’t drink from a baby bottle when she’s awake but she does with this one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Love the bottle. Hate the nipple.
reviews.reviewText: I saw another reviewer mention adding the Evenflo nipple to this bottle and OMG life changer!!I originally tried the nipple that comes with the bottle on my five week old, and it was way too fast of a flow. And my son hated it. After I added the Evenflo nipple, it was amazing. I love glass bottles themselves. So the combination is perfect. The evenflo nipple fits perfectly in the ring and there’s no leaking. It’s lightweight for being glass. Much easier to hold than the other glass bottles I’ve tried.I bought this set for 7.99 when it was on sale and I think that is a great price. As I’m reviewing this, it’s now listed at 18.99 and I feel like that’s a bit expensive. I want to buy more, but I’m disappointed that it’s so expensive. You can get name brand, better glass bottles, with good nipples for that price. So, I will not be buying any more unless the price comes down.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super cute! No regrets whatsoever
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 5, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Greatest baby bottle if you replace the nipple with evenflo pro wide neck nipple
reviews.reviewText: Ideal for small babies. We replaced the nipples with rh evenflo pro wide-neck nipple and this is babies and mommy’s favorite bottle.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Box came damage and open!
reviews.reviewText: The bottles are nice, but I bought these to use with my breast pump that requires a wide neck bottle. But the part you screw in to the pump part is not compatible which sucks. Besides that, the box came extremely damaged it looked like someone returned it and they sent it to me. If anyone is looking for a good glass baby bottle 4oz, Dr Brown has them for 50cents more.
